name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-tab-support-offline-nodejs
title: A classic CRUD app working in offline mode inside Microsoft Teams.
shortDescription: This sample app demonstrates a classic CRUD application that functions offline within Microsoft Teams. When the Android device reconnects to the internet, users can sync their data with blob storage.
longDescription: This sample app demonstrates a classic CRUD application that functions offline within Microsoft Teams. When the Android device reconnects to the internet, users can sync their data with blob storage.

thumbnails.alt: Solution UX showing gif offline support tickets.

references.name: Teams development videos from the community
